00028 /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00029                 OgreOggSoundRecord::OgreOggSoundRecord(ALCdevice& alDevice) :
00030 mDevice(&alDevice)
00031 ,mContext(0)
00032 ,mCaptureDevice(0)
00033 ,mDefaultCaptureDevice(0)
00034 ,mSamplesAvailable(0)
00035 ,mDataSize(0)
00036 ,mBuffer(0)
00037 ,mSize(0)
00038 ,mOutputFile("output.wav")
00039 ,mFreq(44100)
00040 ,mBitsPerSample(16)
00041 ,mNumChannels(2)
00042 ,mFormat(AL_FORMAT_STEREO16)
00043 ,mBufferSize(8820)
00044 ,mRecording(false)
00045 {
00046 }
00047 /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00048 void    OgreOggSoundRecord::_updateRecording()
00049 {
00050         if ( !mRecording || !mCaptureDevice || !mFile.is_open() ) return;
00051 
00052         // Find out how many samples have been captured
00053         alcGetIntegerv(mCaptureDevice, ALC_CAPTURE_SAMPLES, 1, &mSamplesAvailable);
00054 
00055         // When we have enough data to fill our BUFFERSIZE byte buffer, grab the samples
00056         if (mSamplesAvailable > (mBufferSize / mWaveHeader.wfex.nBlockAlign))
00057         {
00058                 // Consume Samples
00059                 alcCaptureSamples(mCaptureDevice, mBuffer, mBufferSize / mWaveHeader.wfex.nBlockAlign);
00060 
00061                 // Write the audio data to a file
00062                 mFile.write(mBuffer, mBufferSize);
00063 
00064                 // Record total amount of data recorded
00065                 mDataSize += mBufferSize;
00066         }
00067 }
00068 
00069 /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00070 const OgreOggSoundRecord::RecordDeviceList& OgreOggSoundRecord::getCaptureDeviceList() 
00071 {
00072         mDeviceList.clear();
00073         // Get list of available Capture Devices
00074         const ALchar *pDeviceList = alcGetString(NULL, ALC_CAPTURE_DEVICE_SPECIFIER);
00075         if (pDeviceList)
00076         {
00077                 while (*pDeviceList)
00078                 {
00079                         mDeviceList.push_back(Ogre::String(pDeviceList));
00080                         pDeviceList += strlen(pDeviceList) + 1;
00081                 }
00082         }
00083         return mDeviceList;
00084 }

00087 /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00088 bool    OgreOggSoundRecord::isCaptureAvailable()
00089 {
00090         if (alcIsExtensionPresent(mDevice, "ALC_EXT_CAPTURE") == AL_FALSE)
00091         {
00092                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("***--- No Capture Extension detected! ---***");
00093                 return false;
00094         }
00095         return true;
00096 }
00097 
00098 /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00099 bool    OgreOggSoundRecord::initCaptureDevice(const Ogre::String& deviceName, const Ogre::String& fileName, ALCuint freq, ALCenum format, ALsizei bufferSize)
00100 {
00101         if ( !isCaptureAvailable() ) return false;
00102 
00103         mFreq=freq;
00104         mFormat=format;
00105         mBufferSize=bufferSize;
00106 
00107         // Set channel
00108         if              ( mFormat==AL_FORMAT_MONO8 )    { mNumChannels=1; mBitsPerSample=8; }
00109         else if ( mFormat==AL_FORMAT_STEREO8 )  { mNumChannels=2; mBitsPerSample=8; }
00110         else if ( mFormat==AL_FORMAT_MONO16 )   { mNumChannels=1; mBitsPerSample=16;}
00111         else if ( mFormat==AL_FORMAT_STEREO16 ) { mNumChannels=2; mBitsPerSample=16;}
00112 
00113         // Selected device
00114         mDeviceName = deviceName;
00115 
00116         // No device specified - select default
00117         if ( mDeviceName.empty() )
00118         {
00119                 // Get the name of the 'default' capture device
00120                 mDefaultCaptureDevice = alcGetString(NULL, ALC_CAPTURE_DEFAULT_DEVICE_SPECIFIER);
00121                 mDeviceName = mDefaultCaptureDevice;
00122                 LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("Selected Default Capture Device: "+mDeviceName);
00123         }
00124 
00125         mCaptureDevice = alcCaptureOpenDevice(mDeviceName.c_str(), mFreq, mFormat, mBufferSize);
00126         if ( mCaptureDevice )
00127         {
00128                 using namespace std;
00129 
00130                 LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("Opened Capture Device: "+mDeviceName);
00131 
00132                 // attempt to open file (binary | writing)
00133                 mFile.open(mOutputFile.c_str(), ios::out|ios::binary);
00134 
00135                 if ( mFile.is_open() )
00136                 {
00137                         // Prepare a WAVE file header for the captured data
00138                         sprintf(mWaveHeader.szRIFF, "RIFF");
00139                         mWaveHeader.lRIFFSize = 0;
00140                         sprintf(mWaveHeader.szWave, "WAVE");
00141                         sprintf(mWaveHeader.szFmt, "fmt ");
00142                         mWaveHeader.lFmtSize = sizeof(wFormat);         
00143                         mWaveHeader.wfex.nChannels = mNumChannels;
00144                         mWaveHeader.wfex.wBitsPerSample = mBitsPerSample;
00145                         mWaveHeader.wfex.wFormatTag = 0x0001;
00146                         mWaveHeader.wfex.nSamplesPerSec = mFreq;
00147                         mWaveHeader.wfex.nBlockAlign = mWaveHeader.wfex.nChannels * mWaveHeader.wfex.wBitsPerSample / 8;
00148                         mWaveHeader.wfex.nAvgBytesPerSec = mWaveHeader.wfex.nSamplesPerSec * mWaveHeader.wfex.nBlockAlign;
00149                         mWaveHeader.wfex.cbSize = 0;
00150                         sprintf(mWaveHeader.szData, "data");
00151                         mWaveHeader.lDataSize = 0;
00152 
00153                         mFile.write(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&mWaveHeader), sizeof(WAVEHEADER));
00154 
00155                         // Generate buffer for capture data
00156                         mBuffer = OGRE_ALLOC_T(ALchar, mBufferSize, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
00157 
00158                         return true;
00159                 }
00160 
00161                 LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("***--- Unable to open recording file: "+mOutputFile);
00162                 return false;
00163         }
00164 
00165         return false;
00166 }

00168 /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00169 void    OgreOggSoundRecord::startRecording()
00170 {
00171         if ( !mCaptureDevice ) return;
00172 
00173         // Start audio capture
00174         alcCaptureStart(mCaptureDevice);
00175 
00176         // Flag recording
00177         mRecording = true;
00178 }
00179 
00180 /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00181 void    OgreOggSoundRecord::stopRecording()
00182 {
00183         if ( !mRecording || !mCaptureDevice ) return;
00184 
00185         // Stop capture
00186         alcCaptureStop(mCaptureDevice);
00187 
00188         mRecording = false;
00189 
00190 }
00191 
00192 /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00193                 OgreOggSoundRecord::~OgreOggSoundRecord()
00194 {
00195         // Stop recording if necessary
00196         if ( mRecording ) stopRecording();
00197 
00198         // Close file write output
00199         if ( mFile.is_open() ) 
00200         {
00201                 // Check if any Samples haven't been consumed yet
00202                 alcGetIntegerv(mCaptureDevice, ALC_CAPTURE_SAMPLES, 1, &mSamplesAvailable);
00203                 while (mSamplesAvailable)
00204                 {
00205                         if (mSamplesAvailable > (mBufferSize / mWaveHeader.wfex.nBlockAlign))
00206                         {
00207                                 alcCaptureSamples(mCaptureDevice, mBuffer, mBufferSize / mWaveHeader.wfex.nBlockAlign);
00208                                 mFile.write(mBuffer, mBufferSize);
00209                                 mSamplesAvailable -= (mBufferSize / mWaveHeader.wfex.nBlockAlign);
00210                                 mDataSize += mBufferSize;
00211                         }
00212                         else
00213                         {
00214                                 alcCaptureSamples(mCaptureDevice, mBuffer, mSamplesAvailable);
00215                                 mFile.write(mBuffer, mSamplesAvailable * mWaveHeader.wfex.nBlockAlign);
00216                                 mDataSize += mSamplesAvailable * mWaveHeader.wfex.nBlockAlign;
00217                                 mSamplesAvailable = 0;
00218                         }
00219                 }
00220 
00221                 // Fill in Size information in Wave Header
00222                 mFile.seekp(4);
00223                 mSize = mDataSize + sizeof(WAVEHEADER) - 8;
00224                 mFile.write(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&mSize), 4);
00225                 mFile.seekp(42);
00226                 mFile.write(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&mDataSize), 4);
00227                 mFile.close();
00228         }
00229 
00230 
00231         // Destroy audio buffer
00232         if ( mBuffer )  OGRE_FREE(mBuffer, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
00233 
00234         // Close the Capture Device
00235         if (mCaptureDevice) alcCaptureCloseDevice(mCaptureDevice);
00236 }
